name: PEACE AVIATION PTY LTD
about: Peace Aviation is a premier flying school based in Central Queensland, dedicated to providing exceptional aviation services with the motto "service first, safety always." We offer comprehensive training programs for Recreational, Private, and Commercial Pilot's Licences, as well as advanced training options such as Multi-Engine and Instrument Ratings. Our experienced instructors conduct flights in a variety of aircraft, including ultralight training through RAAus for a more affordable private flying option. With a strong focus on safety, flexible training schedules, and a range of aircraft to choose from, Peace Aviation ensures that students receive top-notch education and training. Additionally, we provide Air Charter services and scenic flights, making us a one-stop solution for all aviation needs in Central Queensland. Contact us to start your aviation journey today.
